mapper.select: SELECT a.course_exercises_id, a.course_id, c.course_name, a.course_class, a.student_id, b.full_name AS student_name, a.data_status, CASE WHEN A.data_status = 'P' THEN '待提交' WHEN A.data_status = 'C' THEN '批改中' WHEN A.data_status = 'R' THEN '修改中' WHEN A.data_status = 'S' THEN '已完成' ELSE '未知数据状态' END AS data_status_text, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM shangshufang_customer.student_course_exercises a LEFT JOIN shangshufang_customer.university_student b ON a.student_id = b.student_id LEFT JOIN shangshufang_customer.course c ON a.course_id = c.course_id WHERE course_exercises_id = #{courseExercisesID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_customer.student_course_exercises (course_id, course_class, student_id, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{courseID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseClass, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
